doc:
Joan Sanderson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joan_Sanderson 0 Joan Sanderson (24 November 1912 – 24 May 1992) was an English television and stage actress. During a long career, the tall and commanding actress played dowagers, spinsters and matrons, as well as intense Shakespearean roles. Her television work included the sitcoms, Please Sir! (1968–72) and Me and My Girl (1984–88). Joan_Sanderson ( 24_November_1912 – 24_May_1992 ) was an_English_television_and_stage_actress . During a_long_career , the_tall_and_commanding_actress played dowagers , spinsters_and_matrons , as_well_as intense_Shakespearean_roles . Her_television_work included the_sitcoms , Please_Sir ! (_1968 – 72_) and Me and My_Girl_(_1984 – 88_) .
